âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ End-to-end identity-preserving video diffusion framework â€¢ Synthesizes high-quality videos without post-processing â€¢ Conditioned on a reference image and pose sequence â€¢ Uses image and face embeddings with off-the-shelf extractors â€¢ Global content-aware Face Encoder refines face embeddings
ðŸ“– Summary: StableAnimator is a novel framework for generating high-fidelity human image animations while preserving identity. It uses a video diffusion model with several key modules to ensure ID consistency, including a Face Encoder and ID Adapter. The model also incorporates HJB equation-based optimization for enhanced face quality during inference.
